Text: the patch keeps giving me errors i installed the application, copied the patch into the directory run the patch and it says file in use when the program wasnt active now my videos have watermarks on them because the crack wont work.
Works fine. I patched mine running as admin! Good programme! Many thanks.
can you be more specific please!!!???
I'm having the same issue as phytos2012, can someone please help!?

nevermind, I got it
do the following:

1. unpack the acrhive file
2. install the dvd-converter_full460.exe file
3. copy the wondershare.dvd.converter.v4.5.11-patch file 
4. paste it into the programs directory folder (in this case Program Files > Wondershare > DVD Converter
5. Right click on the wondershare.dvd.converter.v4.5.11-patch file and select "Run As Administrator"
6. hit "Patch", then "Exit", and you're done
work like a charm for me!!!!
